item.title: Knowledge Bubble
item.author: Author
item.description: Background Now, the network infrastructure has spread out from submarine communications cable system to low earth orbit communications system. It breaks through space constrains. Wherever people live, Everyone can share their own feelings, knowledge and experience on the internet. Therefore, The place where people can acquire knowledge is transferred from library to the internet. That further leads to a massive increase in depth and breadth of knowledge that people have acquired.

item.title: Golang
item.author: Author
item.description: Programming Format text string in console display (X) Looking for the solution. The ‘\t’ did not work, especially, cannot align upper and lower text Consider to try ‘imgui’ Network

item.title: Proxmox Commands
item.author: Author
item.description: Record usd Proxmox VE commands. 目录 import disk img Import disk img Transfer .img disc image file to Virtual Machine(vm) disk. The example is to transfer openWRT image file to VM disk. 1 qm importdisk [VM id] [image path] [storage id] Example: 1 qm importdisk 100 ./openwrt.img local-lvm

item.title: Unix-like System Commands
item.author: Author
item.description: Record infrequently used but potential useful commands Contents iperf3 - Network speed test iperf3 Test network speed between devices. First, open server-side iperf/iperf3 service, then, test it by client-side iperf/iperf3 application. Under windows system, the application is iperf3.exe. Open server-side iperf3 service 1 iperf3 -s -p 5201 Open client-side iperf3 service 1 iperf3 -c [ip address] -p 5201
